name: Dungeon Solve
description:
Explore dungeon levels filled with monsters and treasures, open the treasures by solving the puzzles and get stronger. Defeat the bosses. (A procedurally generated, dungeon crawler. It ends at level 20. Need to open all the treasures and kill the boss if it exists, to proceed to the next level. To open the treasures, you must solve the puzzles. )

Interact with the statue to heal, works only once for a level.

This is a school project I've made in 14 weeks. I appreciate it greatly , if you rate it here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScX_Kzbx3XxBXFdTZfFQaxE4dXS_vF7ZP85ffhz...

Key Bindings:                                                                                                                                                   

mouse left click/c - attack button,                                                                                                      

mouse right click/x - interaction button. 

space - pause button.
